thread.title: Chip gear maker Applied Materials reports 29 pct rise in revenue

title: Chip gear maker Applied Materials reports 29 pct rise in revenue
text:
May 17, 2018 / 8:05 PM / Updated 40 minutes ago Chip gear maker Applied Materials reports 29 pct rise in revenue Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 17 (Reuters) - Chip gear maker Applied Materials Inc reported a 28.8 percent rise in quarterly revenue on Thursday as the company benefited from chipmakers spending heavily to meet rising demand for memory from smartphone makers.
Net income rose to $1.13 billion, or $1.09 per share, in the second quarter ended April 29, from $824 million , or 76 cents per share, a year earlier.
The worldâ€™s largest supplier of chip-making equipment said net sales rose to $4.57 billion from $3.55 billion. Reporting by Munsif Vengattil in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila
